channel.title: Spatial Methods on Wenbo Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Spatial Methods on Wenbo Lv

item.title: Advanced Spatial Methods
item.description: On spatial effects in geographical analysis Spatial Dependence atakrig: An R package for multivariate area-to-area and area-to-point kriging predictions Geocomplexity explains spatial errors Spatial Stratefied Heterogeneity(SSH) Geodetector: Principle and prospective An optimal parameters-based geographical detector model(OPGD) Modeling of spatial stratified heterogeneity sandwichr: Spatial prediction in R based on spatial stratified heterogeneity Identifying determinants of spatio-temporal disparities in soil moisture of the Northern Hemisphere using a geographically optimal zones-based heterogeneity model
